rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with Scandinavian simplicity and minimalistic design, serving as the transition from outdoor to indoor living.
The main living space with a modern Scandinavian aesthetic featuring light color palettes, open-plan design with subtle furniture arrangements and large windows to allow natural light.
A compact dining space integrated with the living room, designed for efficient use of space and ease of hosting guests.
Functional kitchen employing Scandinavian style elements with modern appliances, integrated storage solutions, and a central island for additional worktop space.
Small living space for the servant that includes a bed area and storage, positioned strategically to maintain privacy while ensuring accessibility.

openings.location: facing the main entry with a vestibule

vastu_considerations.recommendation: The main entrance should ideally be located in the north or east direction to invite positive energy.
Positioned centrally for balance, with windows on the south and west sides to maximize natural light while ensuring privacy.
